title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Emergency Medicine Simulation-Based Continuing Medical Education (CME) Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational medical terminology and understanding of clinical processes
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Perform patient assessment and initial response procedures in emergency scenarios via VR simulation with 90% accuracy
Establish resolution strategies for three or more clinical problems occurring in actual medical settings using Point of Care Learning tools
Achieve over 80% compliance with standard treatment guidelines by applying the clinical decision support system provided by the CME platform

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
